customer_addr:
11776 S Daniel Street
Terre Haute, IN 47802

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:40am-12:10am
on 05/08/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the facility by knocking on the door at the address provided for the site
of this account, and sending a text message to the registrant’s phone number. The registrant responded to the text
message by calling and indicating that no facility representative could be available for the inspection.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:40am-12:10am 
on 05/08/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the facility by knocking on the door at the address provided for the site 
of this account, and sending a text message to the registrant’s phone number. The registrant responded to the text 
message by calling and indicating that no facility representative could be available for the inspection. 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
